DOC.detailed_description: Design : Multicenter randomize control trial primary care . Sample : We recruit 80 smoker 35 70 year without history lung disease . Subjects randomly assign control intervention group ( 1:1 ) . Study variable : We measure socio-demographic , clinical , anthropometry spirometry data . Food consumption evaluate semi-quantitative food frequency questionnaire ( FFQ ) , energy expenditure physical activity Minnesota Leisure Time Activity questionnaire adherence Mediterranean Diet 14-item questionnaire . Intervention : Nutritional intervention conduct dietitian designs nutrition program enhance traditional Mediterranean diet pattern use new technology educational tool primary care : DIET blog . Participants refer single annual visit one group session per year two year . Analysis : All analysis base intention-to-treat . The result consider clinically relevant detects difference lung function ( decreased FEV1 ) > 10-12 ml/year . A p-value < 0.05 define statistical significance .
